content:
Does anyone have contact with members of the rust embedded group that could make a release for cross?
https://github.com/rust-embedded/cross/issues/542

I feel like it's been long enough that folks won't worry too much about the change list. It'd just be nice to get the changes included in the pre-built binaries provided there or via easy cargo install commands
I think WG-embedded is on the official Rust Discord, so you may want to ask in their channel there.
afaik https://app.element.io/#/room/#rust-embedded:matrix.org is the best place to catch em
Ah, looks like the Discord channel is unofficial.
